title: Student Life
description: A vibrant and enriching experience beyond academics.

holistic.title: Holistic Development
holistic.description: At Sengani Girls School, we believe in the complete development of our students. Beyond academics, we focus on building character, developing life skills, and nurturing talents through various co-curricular and extracurricular activities.

sports.title: Sports & Physical Education
sports.description: Physical fitness and sportsmanship are integral parts of our curriculum. We encourage students to participate in various sports and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

clubs.name: Science Club
clubs.description: Exploring scientific concepts through experiments, projects, and science fairs.

clubs.name: Literary Club
clubs.description: Developing writing skills, organizing debates, and celebrating literature.

clubs.name: Art Club
clubs.description: Expressing creativity through painting, crafts, and visual arts projects.

clubs.name: Music Club
clubs.description: Learning musical instruments, vocal training, and organizing cultural performances.

clubs.name: Community Service
clubs.description: Engaging in social service activities and community development projects.

boarding.title: Boarding Life
boarding.description: Our boarding facilities provide a safe, comfortable, and nurturing environment for students who come from distant places. The hostel life teaches independence, responsibility, and builds lifelong friendships while ensuring academic support and personal care.
